release.change: Changed icons and name to be in compliance with Facebook's policies
Added Notification clearing, this may not update immediately in the extension and may not clear all notifications.
Fixed log-in crash when backing out of the Facebook Activity
Do not show if count is 0 in condensed mode
Added messenger option to open messages
Added Preference to update when screen turns on
Update icons thanks to John Seidner
Added more requested languages on Crowdin.net
Do not show if message/notification count is 0
Added pro versions of Seesmic, FriendCaster
Added preference to launch mobile site instead of regular site
Fixed force close issue on Changelog
Added more options to configured apps
Added link to issues page on Bit Bucket, Can now report bugs, request features
Added option to choose what to launch, for now it should work with Official Facebook app, Chrome, and Browser. Support for more apps is on the way (let me know which you need).
Added BILLING permission (not used right now but maybe in the future)
Fixed login issues, now you will get a second dialog to verify the manage notifications permission
Added ACCESS NETWORK STATE permission to check if there is a data connection before doing operations
Added preference to always show extension
